title: Create UD/UCMDB integration admin user in suite IdM
content:
Create the UD/UCMDB integration admin user

The UD/UCMDB integration admin user is responsible for performing integration between UD/UCMDB and IdM. UD/UCMDB uses the credential of the UD/UCMDB integration admin user to synchronize groups and roles from IdM to UCMDB.

You can create the UD/UCMDB integration admin user in the suite IdM portal by following the instructions below.

  1. Log in to the suite IdM (https://<External_Access_Host>/idm-admin) with suite-admin account, navigate to the SYSBO organization, and then click it.

  2. Go to Users in the navigation pane, click in the toolbar. The ADD USER page opens.

  3. Provide values as described below and click SAVE.

    Field (*required) Description
    Name * Name of the new user. To avoid confusion later, let's enter the user name as cms-integration-admin. 
    Display Name * Display name of the new user. Use cms-integration-admin in this case.
    Password * Specifies a password for the UD/UCMDB integration admin user.
    Type * Select SYSTEM.
    Password Policy Leave the field empty.
    User Attributes Leave empty.
  4. Click SAVE.
    Note When selecting type SYSTEM, if a user has not been assigned a password policy, a "defaultFor=SYSTEM" password policy will be applied upon clicking SAVE. 

Associate group

  1. In the suite IdM (https://<External_Access_Host>/idm-admin) , access the SYSBO organization.

  2. Go to Groups in the navigation pane, click the administrators group, and then click   in the toolbar. The Group Settings page opens.

  3. Scroll down to the Users section, for the Associated Users field, search for and click the cms-integration-admin user to associate it to the group. 

  4. Click SAVE. 

Now UD/UCMDB integration user cms-integration-admin is created successfully in suite IdM under the SYSBO organization. This credential will be used later.
